tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE human_rights_legislation (
    legislation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    legislation_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    legislation_description TEXT,
    country VARCHAR(100),
    date_enacted DATE
);

CREATE TABLE policy_analysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    analysis_description TEXT,
    legislation_id INT REFERENCES human_rights_legislation(legislation_id),
    analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE human_rights_legislation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    enacted_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE human_rights_policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(255),
    details TEXT,
    effective_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE human_rights_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    analysis_text TEXT,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(100),
    analysis_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES human_rights_policies(policy_id)
)

CREATE TABLE HumanRightsLegislation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    law_name VARCHAR(255),
    jurisdiction VARCHAR(100),
    enacted_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE PolicyAnalysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_name VARCHAR(255),
    legislation_id INT,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(100),
    analysis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE LegislationCategories (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE PolicyRecommendations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recommendation TEXT,
    policy_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE violations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_type VARCHAR(100),
    incident_date DATE,
    country_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (country_id) REFERENCES countries(id)
);
